column1: # https://kafka.apache.org/documentation/#kafka_streams_store_monitoring
put-latency-avg 	The average put execution time in ns. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
put-latency-max 	The maximum put execution time in ns. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
put-if-absent-latency-avg 	The average put-if-absent execution time in ns. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
put-if-absent-latency-max 	The maximum put-if-absent execution time in ns. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
get-latency-avg 	The average get execution time in ns. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
get-latency-max 	The maximum get execution time in ns. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
delete-latency-avg 	The average delete execution time in ns. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
delete-latency-max 	The maximum delete execution time in ns. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
put-all-latency-avg 	The average put-all execution time in ns. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
put-all-latency-max 	The maximum put-all execution time in ns. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
all-latency-avg 	The average all operation execution time in ns. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
all-latency-max 	The maximum all operation execution time in ns. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
range-latency-avg 	The average range execution time in ns. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
range-latency-max 	The maximum range execution time in ns. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
flush-latency-avg 	The average flush execution time in ns. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
flush-latency-max 	The maximum flush execution time in ns. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
restore-latency-avg 	The average restore execution time in ns. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
restore-latency-max 	The maximum restore execution time in ns. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
put-rate 	The average put rate for this store. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
put-if-absent-rate 	The average put-if-absent rate for this store. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
get-rate 	The average get rate for this store. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
delete-rate 	The average delete rate for this store. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
put-all-rate 	The average put-all rate for this store. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
all-rate 	The average all operation rate for this store. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
range-rate 	The average range rate for this store. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
flush-rate 	The average flush rate for this store. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
restore-rate 	The average restore rate for this store. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
suppression-buffer-size-avg 	The average total size
column3: of the buffered data over the sampling window. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics

column1: suppression-buffer-size-max 	The maximum total size
column3: of the buffered data over the sampling window. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics

column1: suppression-buffer-count-avg 	The average number of records buffered over the sampling window. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
suppression-buffer-count-max 	The maximum number of records buffered over the sampling window. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
record-e2e-latency-avg 	The average end-to-end latency of a record
column2: measured by comparing the record timestamp with the system time when it has been fully processed by the node. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics

column1: record-e2e-latency-max 	The maximum end-to-end latency of a record
column2: measured by comparing the record timestamp with the system time when it has been fully processed by the node. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics

column1: record-e2e-latency-min 	The minimum end-to-end latency of a record
column2: measured by comparing the record timestamp with the system time when it has been fully processed by the node. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-state-metrics
